mapper.sql: c.commentnum as commentNum , c.userid as userid , c.nickname as nickname , u.imgfilepath as imgFilePath , c.boardnum as boardNum , c.comments as comments , to_char(c.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as regdate , c.parentid as parentId , c.parentnick as parentNick , c.groupnum as groupNum
mapper.select:
select
, c.matchingid as matchingId , c.pronunciation as pronunciation , c.contents as contents , c.posture as posture
from
matching_comment c, userlist u notice_comment c, userlist u appraise_comment c, userlist u
where c.userid = u.userid and boardnum = #{boardNum} order by groupnum , commentnum

select
, c.matchingid as matchingId , c.pronunciation as pronunciation , c.contents as contents , c.posture as posture
from
matching_comment c, userlist u notice_comment, userlist u appraise_comment, userlist u
where c.userid = u.userid
and groupnum = #{groupNum} and parentid is not null and rownum = 1
and groupnum = #{groupNum} and parentid is null

select Round(avg(pronunciation),1) as pronunciation , Round(avg(posture),1) as posture , Round(avg(contents),1) as contents from appraise_comment where userid != #{userid} AND parentid is null AND boardNum = #{boardNum}
